query: SELECT estado, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores GROUP BY estado;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT estado, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM topicos_reuniao_gestores GROUP BY estado;
